tracks.text: A letter M stands in a spotlight. It explodes into a rainbow of confetti. Media Factory.
A silver phoenix erupts in fire and circles of bronze light. Kadokawa Video.
On a white background, the outline of a purple logo forms. A flaming phoenix surrounded by the words Kadokawa Pictures, Inc.
A portal opens near the edge of a cliff. Ainz walks out, wearing a brown cloak. Aura follows, carrying a scroll over her back. Mare follows, wearing gauntlets.
Scroll
The gauntlets
He stares at the expanse of the forest
Light shimmers. A ringed skeleton hand reach out.
Ains stands, wearing a cape that blows in the wind.
Gold text, Overlord
A hoard of skeletons shuffles through a mist
Nazarick, day time. Ains sits, one hand resting against his face, the other holding the staff.
Albedo lies, her white dress emphasizing her slender waist. Black wings wrap around her bare hips.
Aura backflips. Mare holds a staff.
Demiurge adjusts his tie. He wears a red suit and glasses. He has a long, metal tail.
Cocytus, a humanoid insect, exhales frost.
Sebas bows, a hand over his chest.
Shaltear, wearing a black dress with red ribbon twirls, holding a black parasol. She has white hair and red eyes.
Momonga walks down a carpet, depicting animatd scenes. Enri and Nemu.
A warrior woman. The Swords of Darkness smile and embrace.
Lizzy and Nphirea Balear stare.
General Gazef and the Vice Captain look determined.
Nigun smiles.
Clementine and Khajit smile.
Brain Unglaus readies a sword.
A dozen people pose dramatically
Momonga laughs
Hamusuke runs.
Momon and Nabe fly through the air
Surrounded by ogres and goblins, Momon swings twin long swords. Nabe raises a hand and fires a beam of lightning.
Aura pulls Mare onto the back of Fenn, the black wolf. Quadracile, a giant reptile, runs alongside
Armored Albedo spins an axe in Carne village
Cocytus stands on ice, holding an axe and staring at humanoid reptiles
Sebas raises a fist in an alley
Demiurge spreads wings in front of a full moon
Ains flashes between wearing a cloak, the black armor, and the mage robe.
Albedo sheds a tear
Shaltear wears red armor and flies by white wings. She exchanges blows with Ains in a red sky.
Ains takes a flag pole from Albedo. He raises the flag of Ainz Ooal Goan, standing on a cliff with the residents of Nazarick.
Text, Chapter 12, The bloody valkyrie
Demiurge joins Albedo and Cocytus around a table in Ainz's office.
Cocytus blocks Demiurge with an axe
His eyes bulge. They're made of jewels
Cocytus exhales.
They turn to a floating mirror, depicting Ainz walking through a forest.
A branch blocks his path
He grips the branch
He rips the branch from the tree and tosses it aside. He continues forward.
He approaches the clearing.
Magic circles surround him. From the cliff, the twins see the light
The office
Magic circles sit below, around, and above him, with more circles orbiting other circles.
He reaches into shadows and pulls out a silver strap. He puts in on his wrist and taps a digital interface.

He pulls out 6 sticks with writing. He looks at them one by one and adds them to his sash. They say zkazuchi Type-8, Blood-Sucking Flesh-Eating, Earth Recover, Yi-Bow, Iron Fist of School Marm, and Amaterasu Tsukuyomi
Dozens of circles appear above him, glow, and form a pillar of light.
The light fades, revealing a deep crater.
Ainz stands in the clearing dust at the edge of the crater. Shalltear stands in the center of the crater, wearing thick, shiny red armor, a 2 pairs of white, angelic wings.
She races towards him.
She steps, and balls of fire explode around her, pushing her back.
A ball of crackling darkness
A wall of stone. The ball cracks the wall and dissipates.
The teeth of a giant bear trap close into a dome above her. She flies, gets caught, and squirms out.
A tower of magic essence
Crackling darkness
She disappears, then bounces off an invisible field
Orbs of fire
She flies from the bursts
A torrent of glowing needles fly at her. She flies to the ground.
A thousand bone spikes rise from the ground and shoot at her.
Crackling darkness
The darkness dissipates
She summons a lance of blue light
The lance flies. A magic circle appears over his ribs. He looks down as the lance pierces through the circle.
She throws another through his shoulder.
A diagonal line splits our view, and reality slides in different directions. Blood pours from her severed body, stops, and returns to her. Reality re-aligns.
He has a small aura of magic
She shudders from lightning. He's engulfed in flames.
She lands
She stands in a column of darkness. He stumbles in a column of light.
He stands on the edge of the crater, looking down at Shalltear
A pair of bat wings slide up her body, joining her angel wings
A cloud of bats
He conjures a tornado, which consumes the bats. Sharks swim in the center.
Shalltear flies through the tornado
Crackling darkness
She dodges and pierces Ainz with her lance
She sneers. The lance bubbles as it begins to drain.
He disappears and reappears a foot back
A giant wall of fused together skeletons
Power ripples from her hand and explodes the wall, revealing magic circles
The 3 circles fire golden arrows. She flees, and they follow her. Striking her a hundred times
She waves her lance and the arrows dissipate. She dives and strikes Ainz, who flies back.
He rises
The shield pushes against him and sends him crashing to the ground.
She descends
She smiles. A white light forms in front of her and stretches like play-do
The light forms into a glowing white clone of Shalltear
A cloud of bats fly above her. Black rats and wolves emerge from her shadow
Inherion lunges. Ainz dodges.
Shalltear lances her shadow wolves, bats, and rats.
Inherion lances him in the chest.
He dodges strikes and flies back.
A clock appears behind him
Wind ripples across the crater
Shalltear grits her teeth. Inherion strikes. Ainz dodges, the clock ticking behind him
A brilliant light consumes the crater. Inherion dissipates. The shadow animals dissipate. Shalltear stares wide eyed as the light consumes her. Fade to black.
The wind blows golden sand
She stands in the sand
She walks across the golden dune filling the crater.
Text, Next episode preview

Tatemikazuchi Type 8 is spelled contract + honorific + thunder + 8 + type. The writing uses an old-fashioned font associated with samurai. The stick labeled Blood-Sucking Flesh-Eating is written in a combination of kanji and katakana. Choosing to use katakana, instead of hiragana, is done for foreign words and, occasionally, for dramatic emphasis. Earth Recover is written in English using katakana. Yi-Bow uses the character for the mythological archer from ancient China, Hou Yi. Iron Fist of Schoolmarm is spelled woman + teacher + furious + iron + fist. In Japanese, Iron Fist is pronounced Tekken, and was popularized by the video game series. The item is written in a spiky, dramatic font associated with boys' action comics. Amaterasu Tsukuyomi refers to the sun goddess Amaterasu and the moon god Tsukuyomi. The item is written in an old fashioned font associated with historical mysticism.
